verses.t: O sing{H7891} Lordunto the {H3068} a new{H2319} song{H7892}: sing{H7891} Lordunto the {H3068}, all the earth{H776}.
Sing{H7891} Lordunto the {H3068}, bless{H1288} his name{H8034}; shew forth{H1319} his salvation{H3444} from day{H3117} to day{H3117}.
Declare{H5608} his glory{H3519} among the heathen{H1471}, his wonders{H6381} among all people{H5971}.
LordFor the {H3068} is great{H1419}, and greatly{H3966} to be praised{H1984}: he is to be feared{H3372} above all gods{H430}.
For all the gods{H430} of the nations{H5971} are idols{H457}: Lordbut the {H3068} made{H6213} the heavens{H8064}.
Honour{H1935} and majesty{H1926} are before{H6440} him: strength{H5797} and beauty{H8597} are in his sanctuary{H4720}.
Give{H3051} Lordunto the {H3068}, O ye kindreds{H4940} of the people{H5971}, give{H3051} Lordunto the {H3068} glory{H3519} and strength{H5797}.
Give{H3051} Lordunto the {H3068} the glory{H3519} due unto his name{H8034}: bring{H5375} an offering{H4503}, and come{H935} into his courts{H2691}.due…: Heb. of his name
O worship{H7812} Lordthe {H3068} in the beauty{H1927} of holiness{H6944}: fear{H2342} before{H6440} him, all the earth{H776}.in the…: or, in the glorious sanctuary

Say{H559} among the heathen{H1471} that Lordthe {H3068} reigneth{H4427}: the world{H8398} also shall be established{H3559} that it shall not be moved{H4131}: he shall judge{H1777} the people{H5971} righteously{H4339}.
Let the heavens{H8064} rejoice{H8055}, and let the earth{H776} be glad{H1523}; let the sea{H3220} roar{H7481}, and the fulness{H4393} thereof.the fulness…: or, all it containeth
Let the field{H7704} be joyful{H5937}, and all that is therein: then shall all the trees{H6086} of the wood{H3293} rejoice{H7442}

Before{H6440} Lordthe {H3068}: for he cometh{H935}, for he cometh{H935} to judge{H8199} the earth{H776}: he shall judge{H8199} the world{H8398} with righteousness{H6664}, and the people{H5971} with his truth{H530}.
